title: Teacher Professional Development Program for Critical Thinking Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course focusing on helping in-service secondary teachers acquire practical teaching strategies to effectively implement critical thinking education within language subjects.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain various types of cognitive bias examples
Learners can detect students' reasoning errors in language subject assessment materials and propose appropriate feedback strategies
Learners can develop instructional modules that combine explicit teaching methods for critical thinking promotion with task-based learning design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
